channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by IMAS for Europa FM, 5–26 March 2020 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Partidul Social Democrat (S&D): 8–10 seats
  • Partidul Alianța Liberalilor și Democraților (*): 0 seats
  • Partidul Național Liberal (EPP): 13–16 seats
  • Uniunea Democrată Maghiară din România (EPP): 0–2 seats
  • Partidul Mișcarea Populară (EPP): 0 seats
  • PRO România (S&D): 0–3 seats
  • Alianța 2020 USR-PLUS (RE): 6–8 seats
